T02TD1316E:243a-0: he badzro dbha ba ku ru kulle y'a panytsa ma ho pa de @243a * //
T02TD1316E:243a-2: kye'i rdo rje las byung ba'i ku ru kulle'i man ngag chen po lnga /
T02TD1316E:243a-3: bcom ldan 'das kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1316E:243a-4: snying gi dbus las srog rlung mchog gis bskul bas rtsa dbus mchog gi nang zhugs gyen song zhing //
T02TD1316E:243a-5: myur du spyi bo'i zla dbus las 'thon rim gyis gsal bar 'gro can mgo yi g-yon skor te //
T02TD1316E:243a-6: g-yas kyi rna bug las 'thon myur du lag mda'i bu gar zhugs shing phyag rgya cher bsgoms nas //
T02TD1316E:243a-7: rdo rjes rab myur sa bon rgyal po bdag nyid 'od zer dmar po 'bar bas bsgrub bya yi //
T02TD1316E:243a-8: lag mda'i rtse mo'i bu ga rgyas byed sngon du 'gro bas sgra 'dzin bu gar rab zhugs shing //
T02TD1316E:243a-9: mgo yi g-yas kyi sna bug gsal bar 'gro ba can gyis snying gi mtsho skyes dbus gnas pa'i //
T02TD1316E:243a-10: hr'i: sems myur du khyer nas rim bzhin rjes su lam de dang ni de nas 'thon nas ni //
T02TD1316E:243a-11: brtan par snying dbus la gnas khyod kyis sa yi 'khor lo dang bcas lha ni dbang du sdud //
T02TD1316E:243a-14: // / sngar bzhin mda' las 'thon nas bsgrub bya'i mtsho skyes g-yon gyi ngos zhugs shing //
T02TD1316E:243a-15: gyen du song ste spyi bo'i zla ba rim bzhin 'dzag byas sngar bzhin zhugs //
T02TD1316E:243a-16: mtsho skyes ze 'bru la gnas rnal 'byor pas ni brtan par bsgoms pa yis //
T02TD1316E:243a-17: chags pas 'dzag pa'i las kyis rgyal can ma yi skye bo myos par byed //
T02TD1316E:243a-20: // / sprul gyis bzung ba'i snying ga'i zla dbus gnas pa gsal bar mthong nas de'i //
T02TD1316E:243a-21: 'od zer bdud rtsi mang po'i rgyun gyi khrus kyis sprul gyi dug sel zhing //
T02TD1316E:243a-22: rtsa bug 'od zer gang ba las kyang dug 'joms 'od ldan zla dbus gnas //
T02TD1316E:243a-23: de ltar sbrul gyis gzung ba la ni byams pas lha khyod dug ni 'joms //
T02TD1316E:243a-26: // / mar me brtan pa'i rnam pa can //
T02TD1316E:243a-27: brtan por dmigs pa'i sems kyis su //
T02TD1316E:243a-28: lce yi rtse mor bsam byas na //
T02TD1316E:243a-29: mi shes rab ril sel bar 'gyur //
T02TD1316E:243b-0: // / gsal bar rlung gi dkyil 'khor gnas shing lcags kyus snying la phug / ske la zhags pas bcings shing skra grol gcer bus g-yengs @243b pa can //
T02TD1316E:243b-1: lha mo khyod ni rnal 'byor stobs kyis nor 'dzin bkug nas ni //
T02TD1316E:243b-2: bdag gi rkang drung 'gyel zhing rtag tu khol po'i gnas skabs 'dzin //
T02TD1316E:243b-3: dmar po'i rnam can spros pa'i 'od kyi dra bas rnam par bcings //
T02TD1316E:243b-4: bdag gi rkang drung 'gyel zhing skra grol lag gi mda' bsnun nas //
T02TD1316E:243b-5: g-yon pa'i rlung gis bkug ste bcings shing mtsho skyes nang du bcug / lte ba'i mtsho skyes dbus su zhugs te mos shing thal mo sbyar //
T02TD1316E:243b-6: sems dpa' padma las 'dzag khrag gis spyi bor khrus byas la //
T02TD1316E:243b-7: rnal 'byor pa des bsgoms na lha dbang yang ni dbang du 'gyur //
T02TD1316E:243b-10: // / kye'i rdo rje las byung ba'i ku ru kulle'i man ngag chen po lnga slob dpon zhi pa 'tshos mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1316E:243b-12: // / pandi ta h'a na sh'i la nyid kyis bsgyur ro /
T02TD1316E:243b-14: // / aom ku ru kulle hr'i: sv'a h'a /
T02TD1316E:243b-15: aom ku ru kulle aa mu ky'a: pandi ma a'a karsha ya hr'i: sv'a h'a /
T02TD1316E:243b-16: aa mu kim s'a dhy'am a'a karasha ya /
T02TD1316E:243b-17: aa mu kim ba sh'im na ya /
T02TD1316E:243b-18: aa mu kam ba shyam ku ru /
T02TD1316E:243b-19: aa mu ka ba shya ku ru /
T02TD1316E:243b-20: ma ma a'a kri shtam ku ru /
T02TD1316E:243b-21: me a'a kri shti ku ru /
T02TD1316E:243b-22: a'atma kam a'a kri shtam ku ru /
T02TD1316E:243b-24: na mo me raksha ku ru na ma: na mo me sh'am tim ku ru na ma:/
T02TD1316E:243b-25: boo sha ta me pushti ku ru boo shta /
T02TD1316E:243b-26: ho de ba dattam me ba shyam ku ru ho: hr'i: de ba da ttam me a'a karsha ya h'i: dza: de ba da ttam me a'a karsha ya dza: me d'a ki ma ma d'a ki a'atma kam /
